root.name: Plaque Attack
root.description: In Plaque Attack, you play as a tube of toothpaste floating around inside of a mouth. Your goal is to defend the teeth from waves of junk food that is attempting to break down the teeth. Players who scored 35,000 points or more could send a picture of the accomplishment to Activision in order to receive a patch. The game will be released on September 22, 2010 for Microsoft's Game Room platform.
